trans-unit.source: Provides schema compilation options for the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> class This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 스키마 컴파일 옵션을 제공 된 <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> 클래스가이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The XmlSchemaCompilationSettings class provides schema compilation options for the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>클래스</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> 에 대 한 스키마 컴파일 옵션을 제공 하는 XmlSchemaCompilationSettings 클래스는

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A> property specifies that the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations when schemas in the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> are compiled.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>속성을 지정 하는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>Unique Particle Attribution UPA () 위반에 대 한 확인 해야 경우에 포함 된 스키마는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>컴파일됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> </xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings.EnableUpaCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaCompilationSettings"></xref> class.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> Unique Particle Attribution UPA () 위반에 대 한 확인 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When the EnableUpaCheck property is set to `false`, validation will be performed based on the following rules.
trans-unit.target: EnableUpaCheck 속성이로 설정 되 면 `false`, 유효성 검사는 다음 규칙을 기준으로 수행 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between a strong type and a wildcard, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the strongly typed particle as illustrated in the following schema and Xml examples.
trans-unit.target: 강력한 형식 사이의 와일드 카드를 선택 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>다음 스키마와 Xml 예제에 설명 된 대로 강력한 형식의 파티클을 선택 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `A` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:any namespace="##any"/>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `</xs:sequence>`다음 Xml에는 `A` 요소 연관 될 `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` 스키마에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If there is a choice between two strongly typed elements, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet> will pick the first one.
trans-unit.target: 강력한 형식의 두 요소 사이의 선택 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>첫 번째 선택 됩니다.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet>

trans-unit.source: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>` In the following Xml, the `B` element will be associated with `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` in the schema.
trans-unit.target: `<xs:sequence>` `<xs:element name="A" type="xs:string"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string"/>` `</xs:sequence>`다음 Xml에는 `B` 요소 연관 될 `<xs:element name="B" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/>` 스키마에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"></xref> should check for Unique Particle Attribution (UPA) violations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet"> </xref> 위반 Unique Particle Attribution UPA ();를 확인 하 고, 그러지 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
